provider.description: Identifies who the provider is for configuration.

type.description: Identifies what aws machine type should be used (m3.medium, etc.).

subnet.description: Identifies what subnets should be used.  These are names of subnets created elsewhere in the configuration.

tags.description: List of AWS tags to associate with the node.

labels.description: List of Kubernetes labels to associate with the node.

storage.description: List of storage devices to attach to the node.

enablePublicIPs.description: Overrides the vpc's subnet values. Do we allow for Auto-assigned Public IPs
